DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial Phase II trial evaluate efficacy induction chemotherapy use Genexol-PM + cisplatin locally advanced head neck cancer . The investigator try evaluate response rate Genexol-PM + cisplatin chemotherapy , safety profile .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Genexol-PM Cisplatin Locally Advanced Head Neck Cancer
